exceptions.tactic: unfold SR, MPCP, SR_MPCP_cor, rewt in *.
exceptions.exn: Cannot turn inductive rewt into an evaluable reference.

In environment P1 : card nat * stack nat -> Prop X : SRS ?X -> SR.string ?X -> SR.string ?X -> Prop P0 : SRS nat * SR.string nat * SR.string nat -> Prop H : forall (R : stack nat) (x0 y0 : string), (exists A : list (list nat * list nat), A <<= P R x0 y0 /\\ dollar R x0 y0 :: tau1 A = dollar R x0 y0 :: (x0 ++ [hash R x0 y0]) ++ tau2 A) -> rewt R x0 y0 H0 : forall (R : stack nat) (x0 y0 : string), rewt R x0 y0 -> exists A : list (list nat * list nat), A <<= P R x0 y0 /\\ dollar R x0 y0 :: tau1 A = dollar R x0 y0 :: (x0 ++ [hash R x0 y0]) ++ tau2 A The term "H" has type "forall (R : stack nat) (x0 y0 : string), (exists A : list (list nat * list nat), A <<= P R x0 y0 /\\ dollar R x0 y0 :: tau1 A = dollar R x0 y0 :: (x0 ++ [hash R x0 y0]) ++ tau2 A) -> rewt R x0 y0" while it is expected to have type "?A <<= P ?R ?x0 ?y0" (cannot unify "(list nat * list nat)%type" and "stack nat").
The reference A was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

original: intros. unfold SR, MPCP, SR_MPCP_cor, rewt in *. specialize (MPCP_SR _ _ _ _ _ _ H H H H). intros [A [H1 H2]]. exists A. split; auto.
